title: The Wee Man (2013)(dvd9)(Nl subs) RETAIL SAM TBS
description:
The Wee Man (2013)

Dutch
De jaren '60. Als 11-jarige jongen heeft Paul geleerd dat het leven op straat
hard is. Armoede leidt er tot corruptie, geweld en intimidatie. Iedereen kent
er zijn plaats. Als kleine jongen wordt Paul gepest, maar langzaam werkt hij
zich op in de misdaadsector om zich af te zetten tegen de 'monsters' uit zijn
jeugd.

Englisch
1970's Blackhill, Glasgow: 11-year-old Paul Ferris has learned quickly that life
on the street is tough. Everyone knows their place. Poverty breeds corruption,
crime, violence and bullying. Growing up immersed in a culture of crime, Ferris
finally snaps when tormented one too many times by a vicious gang of bullying
neighbourhood brothers who have made his childhood a living hell. Now in his
late teens, despite his father's advice and in the frustrated knowledge that the
law enforcement and police do nothing to help, he decides to take on his
tormentors alone and systematically wreak vengeance on them. Consequently
attracting a street reputation, Ferris is sought out by the 'Godfather' of the
Glaswegian gangster community, Arthur Thompson Snr. Again ignoring his father's
advice, he starts to work for the gangland boss throughout the '80s and '90s,
rising through the ranks
